content.rendered:
On June 2, Saratoga Springs High School celebrated the following student-athletes for their commitment to compete at the collegiate level.

Lauren Barlow – Bryn Mawr College
Sydney Closinski – St. John Fisher College
Alexander Teator –  Babson College
Ellie Ripchik – Belmont Abbey College
Jackson Reynolds – Oberlin College
Eliana Kelly – St. John Fisher College
Isabel Pecora – Roger Williams University
Zach Carpenter – Marywood University
Cole Harris – St. Lawrence University
Alexa Cate – Assumption University
Isabelle Shields – The University of Vermont
Lucy Daly – Endicott College
Clare Wendell – Endicott College
Brendan Young – Penn State Altoona
Noah Joly – Stevenson University
Jackson Reynolds – Oberlin College
Alexa Cate – Assumption University
John Foster – UConn
Morgan Flatley – St. John Fisher College
Lily Gutch – Hobart and William Smith Colleges
Sadie McBain – Colorado School of Mines
Isabella Labate – SUNY Brockport
Brady Jennings – Wichita State University
Nate Siewert – Alfred University
Nathan Rodriguez – Ithaca college
Matthew Kilinski – SUNY Potsdam
Michael Kilinski – SUNY New Paltz

Congratulations to all student-athletes!
